SA20n1307:2: samāsato bodhisattvā yatra śikṣante yathā ca śikṣante yacca śikṣante tat sarvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya bodhisattvacaryetyucyate |
SA20n1307:6: svārthaḥ parārthaḥ tattvārthaḥ prabhāvaḥ sattvaparipākaḥ ātmano buddhadharmaparipākaḥ anuttarā ca samyaksaṃbodhiḥ saptamaṃ sthānam |
SA20n1307:10: svaparārthaḥ katamaḥ samāsato daśavidhaḥ svaparārtho veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1307:11: kevalaṃ parasambaddhaḥ hitānvayaḥ sukhānvayaḥ hetusaṃgṛhītaḥ phalasaṃgṛhītaḥ ehikaḥ āmutrikaḥ ātyantikaḥ anātyantikaśca |
SA20n1307:12: tatra kevalaḥ svārthaḥ parārthaśca bodhisattvena parijñāya prahātavyaḥ bodhisattvavidheḥ samatikrāntatvādananurūpatvācca |
SA20n1307:14: tatrāyaṃ kevalaḥ svārtho bodhisattvasya yo'nena parijñāya prahātavyo bhavati |
SA20n1307:16: dharmamatsariṇo vā punaḥ sato dharmāṇāṃ buddhabodhisattvabhāṣitānāṃ paryeṃṣaṇā dhāraṇā ca |
SA20n1307:17: svargakāmasya svargārtha śīlaṃ vīryārambhaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāṃ samādāya vartanā |
SA20n1307:19: lābhakāmasya vā lābhanimittaṃ lābhanirvartakaṃ mamārthaṃ pareṣāmutplāvakaṃ vicitrābhūtaguṇākhyānam |
SA20n1307:20: ātmanaḥ paricaryāsvīkaraṇakāmasya paricaryāsvīkaraṇārthamadharmeṇa gaṇasaṃgraho na dharmeṇa |
SA20n1307:21: parato dāsabhūtān sattvān dāsabhāvāddhi pramokṣayati yāvadevātmano dāsabhāvāya |
SA20n1307:22: bandhanabaddhān sattvān bandhanādvimokṣya svayameva badhnāti yāvadevātmanaḥ kṛtyaniṣpattaye |
SA20n1307:23: daṇḍādibhayabhītāṃśca sattvān parato daṇḍādibhayādvipramokṣayati yāvadeva svayameva bhayagrahaṇārtham |
SA20n1307:24: dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāraśca bodhisattvasya sattvārthanidhyānavirahitaḥ kevalaḥ svārtho veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1307:25: ityevaṃbhāgīyo bodhisattvasya kevalaḥ svārtho vedivtayo yo bodhisattvena parijñāya prahātavyaḥ |
SA20n1307:26: dānaṃ punaḥ bodhisattvasya kṣāntiśca kāruṇyapūrvakaṃ vā bodhipariṇataṃ vā svarganimittaṃ vā nityakālaṃ parasambaddha eva svārtho veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1307:27: ityetān yathānirdiṣṭānākārān sthāpayitvā tadanya etadviparyayātsvārtho bodhisattvānāṃ sarva eva parārthasambaddho veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1307:28: tatrāyaṃ bodhisattvasya kevalaḥ parārtho bodhisattvena parijñāya prahātavyaḥ |
SA20n1307:29: vipanna dṛṣṭerdānam anāgamadṛṣṭeraphaladarśinaḥ bhraṣṭaśīlasya pratipattivirahitasya pareṣāṃ dharmadeśanā |
SA20n1307:31: tathāhi sa dhyānairvihṛtya dhyānaṃ vyāvarttya praṇidhāya yatra kāmaṃ tatra kāmadhātāvupapadyate |
SA20n1307:32: vaśitāprāptasya ca bodhisattvasya daśasu nikṣu vicitrairnirmāṇaiḥ vicitrāṇāṃ sattvānāmarthakriyā |
SA20n1307:35: tatra pūrvako dvividhaḥ parārthaḥ kevalo yathā nirdiṣṭo bodhisattvena parijñāya prahātavyaḥ |
SA20n1307:36: tadanyatra ca kevale parārthe bhūyasyā mātrayā śikṣitavyam |
SA20n1307:37: ityetānākārān sthāpayitvā etadviparyayācca bodhisattvānāṃ sarvaḥ parārthaḥ svārthaḥ sambaddhaḥ |
SA20n1307:42: tatra yatkiṃcid bodhisattvaḥ ātmanā vā parīttaṃ prabhūtaṃ vā kuśalaparigrahaṃ kuśalopacayaṃ karoti paraṃ vā parītte prabhūte vā kuśalaparigrahe kuśalopacaye samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati |
SA20n1307:44: yatkiṃcidvodhisattvaḥ ātmano vā parasya vā kliṣṭa varjitaṃ sukhamupasaṃharati upakaraṇasukhaṃ vā dhyānasukhaṃ vā ayaṃ bodhisattvasyānugrāhakalakṣaṇo hitānvayaḥ svaparārtho veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1307:49: sa punareṣa caturvidhaḥ svaparārthaḥ caturṣu dharmasamādaneṣvanupūrva yathāyogaṃ dṛṣṭavyaḥ |
SA20n1307:56: tatra nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃsaṃprāpakaśca nirvāṇapakṣyā laukikalokottarā dharmā ityeṣa samāsato bodhisattvasya hitānvaya aupaśamikaḥ svaparārthaḥ sarvaprativiśiṣṭo niruttaro veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1307:60: hetusukhaṃ veditasukhaṃ duḥkhaprātipakṣikaṃ sukhaṃ veditopacchedasukhamavyabādhyañca pañcam sukham |
SA20n1307:62: taddhetukaśca yaḥ sparśaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ yacca kiñcidiṣṭaphalaṃ karma dṛṣṭe dharme abhisaṃparāye vā tatsarvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya hetusukhamityucyate |
SA20n1307:64: duḥkhapraśamanāpekṣaḥ ebhireva hetusukhasaṃgṛhītaistribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ saṃbhūtaḥ kāyacittānugrahakaro'nubhavo veditasukhamityucyate |
SA20n1307:68: tatpunaḥ sarva traidhātukaṃ yathāyogaṃ ṣaḍvidhamāyatanabhedena cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajaṃ yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśajam |
SA20n1307:72: śītoṣṇakṣutpipāsādikānāmanekavidhānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ bahunānāprakārāṇāmutpannotpannānāṃ śītoṣṇakṣutpipāsādiduḥkhapratikāreṇa praśamāt tasminneva duḥkhopaśamamātrake yā sukhabuddhirutpadyate idamucyate duḥkhaprātipakṣikaṃ sukham |
SA20n1307:80: tatra hetusukhaṃ sukhahetutvāt sukhaṃ na svabhāvataḥ |
SA20n1307:81: veditasukhaṃ na hetubhāvādapi tu svabhāvata eva |
SA20n1307:82: duḥkha-prātipakṣikaṃ sukhaṃ na ca hetubhāvānnāpi svabhāvataḥ api tu duḥkhopaśama-mātrad duḥkhāpakarṣaṇāt sukham |
SA20n1307:83: veditopacchedasukhaṃ na hetubhāvānna svābhāvyānna duḥkhāpakarṣaṇādapi tu yatkiṃcidveditam |
SA20n1307:84: idamatra duḥkhasyeti kṛtvā pāramārthikasya duḥkhasya tāvatkālikvavihāra-vyupaśamāt sukham |
SA20n1307:85: avyābādhya-sukha-saṃgṛhītaṃ paścimaṃ saṃbodhisukhamāyatyāṃ ca tasyaiva pāramārthikasya duḥkhasyātyanta-vyupaśamād dṛṣṭe ca dharme sarva-kleśa-pakṣyasya dauṣṭhulyagyāśrayagatasyātyantoparamāt sukham |
SA20n1307:86: tadavaśiṣṭamavyābādhya-sukhaṃ tasyaiva paścimasyānukūlatvāt tatpakṣyatvāt tadāvāhakatvāt avyābādhyasukhaṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1307:87: tatra bodhisattvo yadeva hitapakṣyaṃ sukhaṃ tadeva sattvānāmupasaṃharet natu ahitapakṣyam |
SA20n1307:88: ahitapakṣyaṃ punaḥ sukhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā parijñāya tasmāt sattvān vicchandayecchaktitaśca tasyāpakarṣāpahārāya vyāyaccheta |
SA20n1307:89: duḥkhānugatamapi yaddhitaṃ syāt tadvodhisattvena sahaiva duḥkhena sahaiva daurmanasyenākāmakānāṃ sattvānāmupasaṃhartavyamupāyakauśalya-saṃniśrayeṇa |
SA20n1307:90: sukhānugatañcāpi yadahitaṃ syāttadapi sahaiva sukhena saha saumanasyena kāmakānāṃ sattvānāmapahartavyamapakarṣitavya mupāyakauśalya-saṃniśrayeṇa |
SA20n1307:92: sukhāyaiva sa āyatyāṃ sattvānāṃ niyato veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1307:93: yo'sau duḥkhena saha hitopasaṃhāraḥ sukhena ca sahāhitāpakarṣaḥ |
SA20n1307:94: ataeva bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu yo hitakāmaḥ arthataḥ sukhakāmo'pi sa jñeyaḥ |
SA20n1307:96: tathā hi hitaṃ hetusthānīyaṃ sukhaṃ phalasthānīyam |
SA20n1307:98: yaḥ kaściddhitānugataḥ tatra yacceṣṭaphalaṃ karma dṛṣṭe dharme abhisaṃparāye ca hetusukhasaṃgṛhītaṃ yacca duḥkhaprātipakṣikaṃ yacca vedito pacchedasukhaṃ yaccāvyābādhyasukham etadekāntena nirvimarṣo bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣūpasaṃharet |
SA20n1307:100: vedita sukhamindriyaviṣayasparśasaṃgṛhītañca hetusukhaṃ yatsaṃkleśāya vā kliṣṭaṃ vā sāvadyamahitamapathyaṃ tannopasaṃharet |
SA20n1307:101: yatpunarasaṃkleśāyāsaṃkliṣṭaṃ vā'navadyaṃ hitaṃ pathyaṃ ca tadvodhisattvaḥ sattveṣūpasaṃhared yathāśakti yathābalam |
SA20n1307:102: api cātmanā tathaiva samācarecchikṣeta pratyanubhavedityayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ hitasukhānvayaḥ svaparārtho veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1307:106: vipākahetuḥ vipākaphalaṃ puṇyahetuḥ puṇyaphalaṃ jñānahetuḥ jñānaphalam |
SA20n1307:109: āyuḥsaṃpat varṇasaṃpat kulasaṃpat aiśvaryasaṃpat ādeyavākyatā maheśākhyatā manuṣyatvaṃ balameva cāṣṭamam |
SA20n1307:114: yatpunaḥ śraddheyo bhavati pratyayitaḥ sattvānāmutpannotpanneṣvadhikaraṇeṣu prāmāṇikatvena ratheyaḥ kāṃsakūṭatūlākūṭādibhinirmāyāśāṭhyena |
SA20n1307:118: mahadyaśaḥ khyātiścāsya loke prathitā bhavati yaduta śauryaṃ vā vīrya vā dhairyaṃ vā vaicakṣaṇyaṃ vā naipuṇyaṃ vā sauśīlyaṃ vā vicitraśilpakarmasthānātirekataratama-kauśalyaṃ vā ārabhya |
SA20n1307:119: tannidānañca gururbhavati mahājanakāyasya satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyaḥ |
SA20n1307:122: alpābādhatā arogajātīyatā mahotsāhatā ca prakṛtyā balasaṃpat |
SA20n1307:128: āyatyāmātmani vicitraguṇādhānapraṇidhānavato ratnatrayapūjā gurupūjā maheśākhyatāyā hetuḥ |
SA20n1307:133: vinirmokṣaṇatayā ca dharmeṇa puruṣendriyavipralopāyopāttānāmupanītānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ manuṣyatvasya hetuḥ |
SA20n1307:134: kāyena sattvānāṃ vaiyāvṛtya kriyā sahāyakriyā utpannotpanneṣu kṛtyeṣu yathāśakti yathābalaṃ dharmeṇāsāhasena bhakta-tarpaṇa-yavāgupānānāṃ ca vṛṣyāṇāmutsāhakarāṇāmannapānānāṃ sattveṣūpasaṃhāro balasampado hetuḥ |
SA20n1307:136: sa punarayaṃ hetuḥ samāsatastribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ puṣṭo bhavati paripūrṇasya puṣṭasyodārasya vipākasyābhinirvṛttaye |
SA20n1307:139: tatra yā ca śuddhāśayatā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau teṣāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ pariṇamanād yā ca tīvrāśayatā ghanarasenodāreṇa prasādenādhyācaraṇād yā ca sahadhārmikasya darśanenābhipramodanā yā ca pratidivasaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ tadanudharmameva bahulamanuvitarkaṇānuvicāraṇā |
SA20n1307:141: tatra yo dīrghakālābhyāso nirantarakāritā[ca] nipuṇakāritā ca pareṣāñcāsamātte tasmin kuśale samādāpanāya varṇavāditā samātte vā punaḥ saṃharṣaṇāya varṇavāditā teṣāmeva ca tasmin kuśalamūle sanniveśanā pratiṣṭhāpanā |
SA20n1307:143: tatra samāsataḥ prayogasya samyaksampādanāttasyaiva ca samyakprayogasya phale'vasthāpanā tkṣetraśuddhirveditavyā |
SA20n1307:145: āyuḥsaṃpanno bodhisattvo dīrghakālaṃ kuśalapakṣe prayujyate prabhūtañca kuśalamūlopacayaṃ karoti svārtha parārthañcārabhya |
SA20n1307:149: tayā ca manojñarūpatayā sammukhībhāvopagamanāccāsya mahājanakāyo vacanaṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyate |
SA20n1307:151: kulasaṃpanno bodhisattvaḥ sammato bhavati mahājanakāyasya pūjyaśca praśasyaśca |
SA20n1307:152: sammatatvācca pūjyatvātpraśasyatvād yatra yatra vastuni sattvān samādāpayati te tejograstāstatra tatrāśu pratipadyante na vivadante na viceṣṭante'kriyāyai |
SA20n1307:154: aiśvaryasaṃpanno bodhisattvo dānena sattvān saṃgṛhṇāti paripācayati |
SA20n1307:156: ādeyavacano bodhisattvaḥ priyavāditayā arthacaryayā samānārthatayā ca sattvān gṛhṇāti paripācayati |
SA20n1307:158: maheśākhyo bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ vicitraiḥ kṛtyakaraṇīyaiḥ sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchannupakārī bhavati |
SA20n1307:159: yenopakāre ṇāvabaddhacittāḥ sattvā asya gauravāt kṛtajñatayā ca laghuladhvevājñāmanuvartante satkṛtyādareṇa |
SA20n1307:161: manuṣyabhūto bodhisattvaḥ purūṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato bhājanabhūto bhavati sarvaguṇānāṃ sarvavyavasāyānāṃ sarvajñeyapravicayānām |
SA20n1307:162: viśāradaśca bhavatyanāvṛtagatiḥ sarvasattvasarvakālopasaṃkramaṇasaṃbhāṣaṇasaṃvāsasaṃbhogaraho vihārāṇam idaṃ puruṣatva phalaṃ bodhisattvasya veditavyam |
SA20n1307:163: balasaṃpanno bodhisattvaḥ akhinno bhavati kuśaladharmārjanaprayogeṇa sattvānugrahaprayogeṇa ca |
SA20n1307:166: itīdaṃ bodhisattvānāmaṣṭavidhasya vipākasyāṣṭavidhaṃ phalaṃ yadbhavati sattvānāṃ copakārāya buddhadharmāṇāścodayāyānukūlamanuguṇam |
SA20n1307:167: asmin khalu bodhisattvo vipākaphale vyavasthitaḥ svayañca śakto bhavati pratibalaḥ sattvānāṃ vicitraprabhūtārthakaraṇe |
SA20n1307:168: te'pi cāsya vineyā niyojyā bhavanti yathākāmakaraṇīyāya yaduta svārthakriyāmārabhya |
SA20n1307:169: svayañcedayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ pratibalaḥ syādvineyāścāsya na niyojyā bhaveyuḥ |
SA20n1307:170: evamasya na pracurā syānna pradakṣiṇā parārthakriyā yenāyaṃ na śaknuyāt parārthaṃ kartum |
SA20n1307:171: svayañcedayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ aśaktaḥ syādapratibalo vineyāścāsya niyojyāḥ syuḥ svārthakriyāmārabhyaivamapi bodhisattvasya parārthakriyā na pracurā na pradakṣiṇā syād yenāyaṃ na śaknuyāt parārtha kartum |
SA20n1307:172: tasmādubhayasānnidhye ubhayasaṃpadiṃ satyāṃ bodhisattvasya sattvārthakriyā pracurā bhavati pradakṣiṇā yena śaknoti parārthaṃ kartum |
SA20n1307:173: tathābhūtaścāsau bodhisattvaḥ ātmanaśca buddhadharmān sattvāṃśca triṣu yāneṣu kṣiprameva paripācayati |
SA20n1307:176: tadanena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvānāṃ yasmādaṣṭavidhaṃ vipākaphalaṃ hitasukhāya sattvānāṃ saṃvartate |
SA20n1307:177: tasmād yaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ bandhyo nirarthaḥ saṃsāraḥ sa teṣāmavandhyaśca mahārthaśca bhavati ||
SA20n1307:183: vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā ca puṇyapakṣyā jñānapakṣyā ca veditavyā |
SA20n1307:184: yadvīrya niśritya dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ vā samādatte rakṣati maitryādīni cāpramāṇāni bhāvayati |
SA20n1307:186: yatpunarvīryaṃ niśritya śrutacintābhāvanāmayyāṃ prajñāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti skandhakauśalyaṃ vā karoti dhātukauśalyamāyatanakauśalyaṃ pratītyasamutpādakuśalyaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhataḥ samudayaṃ vā samudayato nirodhaṃ vā nirodhato mārgaṃ vā mārgataḥ pratyavekṣate |
SA20n1307:187: kuśalākuśalāndharmān sāvadyānanavadyān hīnapraṇītān kṛṣṇaśuklasapravibhāgapratītyasamutpannān dharmān yathābhūtaṃ pravicinoti pratyavekṣate |
SA20n1307:189: yaddhyānaṃ niśrityaṃ dānaṃ vā dadāti śīlaṃ vā samādatte rakṣati maitryādīni cāpramāṇāni bhāvayati |
SA20n1307:191: yatpunardhyānaṃ niśritya śrutacintābhāvanāyyāṃ prajñāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti skandhakauśalyaṃ vā pūrvavat sarvaṃ vaktavyaṃ tadyathā vīrye |
SA20n1307:197: puṇyajñānapratilambhasthānopacayāya yacchandaḥ anukūlo'vidhuraḥ pratyayaḥ pūrvakaśca puṇyajñānābhyāsaḥ |
SA20n1307:198: tatrāyamavidhuraḥ pratyayaḥ yā viparītasya ca pratyayasyāpratyupasthānamasannihitatā |
SA20n1307:200: tatra yā pāpamitramāgamya viparītā puṇyajñānadeśanā viparītena vā manaskāreṇa viparītagrāhitā |
SA20n1307:204: teṣāñca vivarjanamanutpādaḥ pratyayo'vidhura ityucyate bodhisattvasya puṇyajñānayoḥ |
SA20n1307:205: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ hetūnāmanyatamavaikalyānnāpi puṇyasya nāpi jñānasya prasūtirveditavyā |
SA20n1307:207: puṇyamāśritya bodhisattvo'kṣataḥ saṃsāre saṃsarati nātyarthaṃ duḥkhairbādhyamānaḥ |
SA20n1307:209: jñānamāśritya bodhisattvaḥ samyak puṇyaparigrahaṃ karoti na mithyā vicitrāprameyakauśalyakriyayā ca yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate |
SA20n1307:210: itīdaṃ samāsena puṇyajñānaphalaṃ yathāyogaṃ caturvidhaṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1307:212: tatra yaśca vipāko yaśca vipākaheturyacca vipākaphalaṃ sarvametatpuṇyāśritaṃ puṇyaprabhavam |
SA20n1307:214: puṇyaṃ pradhānaṃ jñānaṃ punarnirūttaram puṇyajñānaṃ tadanyataravaikalyādayaṃ bodhisattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ nādhigacchet |
SA20n1307:220: pūrvakasya ceṣṭaphalasya karmaṇo vipakvavipākasya yo dṛṣṭe dharme phalopabhogaḥ |
SA20n1307:221: dhyānavyāvartanakuśalasya ca bodhisattvasya dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārthaṃ dṛṣṭa eva ca dharme tatsanniśrayo na parārthaprasādhanārthaṃ dhyānasanniśrayaḥ |
SA20n1307:222: yacca dṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇaṃ tathāgatabhūtasya ye ca laukikalokottarā dṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇasaṃprāpakāḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ |
SA20n1307:226: tatra yā ca kāmadhātau bhogasaṃpatparatra yā cātmabhāvasaṃpat paratra |
SA20n1307:227: yā ca paratra dhyānārūpyopapattiḥ tasyāśca paratra bhogātmabhāvasaṃpado dhyānārūpyopapatteśca yā dṛṣṭe dharme sahaiva duḥkhena sahaiva daurmanasyena pratisaṃkhyāya pratisaṃkhyāya hetvāsevanā |
SA20n1307:228: ayaṃ sāṃparāyika eva bodhisattvasya svaparārtho veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1307:229: yā punardṛṣṭe dharme sahaiva sukhena sahaiva saumanasyena bhogātmabhāvasaṃpado hetvāsevanā |
SA20n1307:234: kāmadhātau bhogātmabhāvasaṃpattiḥ sahetuphalā laukikī ca pṛthagjanānāṃ śuddhiḥ sahetuphalā anātyantikaḥ svaparārthaḥ |
SA20n1307:235: sarvātyantakleśaprahāṇamāryāṣṭāṅgaśca mārgaḥ tadāśrayeṇa ca ye laukikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ pratilabdhāḥ |
SA20n1307:237: tatra tribhiḥ kāraṇairātyantikatā anātyantikatā ca veditavyā |
SA20n1307:243: ityayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ daśavidhaḥ svaparārthaḥ samāsavistarataḥ yatra bodhisattvairyathāśakti yathābalaṃ śikṣitavyam nāta ūttari nāto bhūyaḥ |
SA20n1307:244: atīte'pyadhvanyanāgate'pi ye svaparārthe śikṣitavantaḥ śikṣiṣyante sarve te'sminneva daśavidhe svaparārthe |
